suite.name: Chatgpt Test Cases

kw.name: Make sure that the API key is filled
kw.doc: We make sure that the API key is filled to connect to ChatGPT.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Be String
kw.doc: Fails if the given ``item`` is not a string.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: The API key is filled as a string
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: The API key is filled as a string

kw.name: Get Library Instance
kw.doc: Returns the currently active instance of the specified library.
kw.msg: &{all libs} = { BuiltIn=<robot.libraries.BuiltIn.BuiltIn object at 0x000001CC786E0610> | Reserved=<robot.libraries.Reserved.Reserved object at 0x000001CC787376A0> | Easter=<module 'robot.libraries.Easter' from 'C:\...

kw.name: Launch tag test with a command line
kw.arg: robot -d results -i Sanity -i fetch -i smoke chatgpt\\chatgpt_test_cases.robot
kw.doc: Execution of a command line through the "Run" keyword in the OperatingSystem library

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.
kw.msg: Running command 'robot -d results -i Sanity -i fetch -i smoke chatgpt\chatgpt_test_cases.robot 2>&1'.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: The return code is ============================================================================== Chatgpt Test Cases :: To execute a test case using a tag, write this comman... ============================================================================== Example Test Case Left part: World! | PASS | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Test Case 1 This is test case 1 | PASS | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Test Case 4 This is test case 4 | PASS | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Test Case 5 This is test case 5 | PASS | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Chatgpt Test Cases :: To execute a test case using a tag, write th... | PASS | 4 tests, 4 passed, 0 failed ============================================================================== Output: D:\Sauvegarde travaux Cham\Robot_Framework\Robot_Framework_practice\results\output.xml Log: D:\Sauvegarde travaux Cham\Robot_Framework\Robot_Framework_practice\results\log.html Report: D:\Sauvegarde travaux Cham\Robot_Framework\Robot_Framework_practice\results\report.html

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: {'BuiltIn': <robot.libraries.BuiltIn.BuiltIn object at 0x000001CC786E0610>, 'Reserved': <robot.libraries.Reserved.Reserved object at 0x000001CC787376A0>, 'Easter': <module 'robot.libraries.Easter' from 'C:\\Users\\Cham\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python310\\lib\\site-packages\\robot\\libraries\\Easter.py'>, 'RPA.OpenAI': <RPA.OpenAI.OpenAI object at 0x000001CC78760AC0>, 'String': <robot.libraries.String.String object at 0x000001CC7F3197E0>, 'OperatingSystem': <robot.libraries.OperatingSystem.OperatingSystem object at 0x000001CC7F31B790>, 'Screenshot': <robot.libraries.Screenshot.Screenshot object at 0x000001CC7F871540>, 'python_tag_class': <python_tag_class.python_tag_class object at 0x000001CC7F871900>, 'Dialogs': <module 'robot.libraries.Dialogs' from 'C:\\Users\\Cham\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python310\\lib\\site-packages\\robot\\libraries\\Dialogs.py'>, 'Collections': <robot.libraries.Collections.Collections object at 0x000001CC7F570520>, 'SeleniumLibrary': <SeleniumLibrary.SeleniumLibrary object at 0x000001CC7F573820>}

suite.doc: To execute a test case using a tag, write this command in the terminal :robot -d results -i Smoke Tests/Tags.robot For further information: https://testersdock.com/robot-framework-tags/
